Header.title: VidShield
Header.paragraph: A Creator platform with Video NFT and Piracy protection

About.paragraph: VidShield is decentralized video platform with Video NFTs and piracy protected web3 video player. It is both creator and viewer friendly platform. Here, creators can work hard and upload their creativity via videos with simple steps. Creators need not worry about video storage, video piracy and not even their earnings. Creator can inroduce their video NFTs. Everything is taken careof. On the other side, viewers can also consume as much content as they want. Viewers can pay minimal yearly subscription fee for their favorite creator and enjoy viewing the content.
